name: Phase 1
description:
This game is about you phasing between 3 phases. The first phase is you flapping, the next is gliding and moving. The last phase allows you to shoot and glide. This one is part of a little contest between me and Miyaki. This is his submission and here is my submission (https://takago.itch.io/aiming-circle). Rate if you like this game below in the comments and give feedback and I am sorry if I can't explain it well. Now it's a multiplayer game and you try to kill the other guy. Simple as that

Controls

P1: Left and Right Key to Flap in Phase 1, Move in Phase 2, Shoot in Phase 3, Down to Phase 

P2: "A" and "D" Key to Flap in Phase 1, Move in Phase 2, Shoot in Phase 3, "S" Key to Phase 

P2: "J" and "L" Key to Flap in Phase 1, Move in Phase 2, Shoot in Phase 3, "K" Key to Phase 

Space to play a 2 player game, B to play a 3 player game, M to add music

Credits: All by Miyaki
